data.actual_result: An emoji identifier prefixed by a colon is printed to the chat (Note: Submitted for <@123623520616972290> )
data.expected_result: The emoji picture shows up prefixed by a colon
data.short_description: Server emoji from emoji menu don't properly format when prefixed by a colon
data.steps_to_repro: - Type a colon into the chat bar - Open the emoji menu - Click an emoji to add it to the chat bar - Send the message
